thread.title: BRIEF-Sunworks' Q4 Revenue Rose 4.6 Pct To $19.3 Mln

title: BRIEF-Sunworks' Q4 Revenue Rose 4.6 Pct To $19.3 Mln
text:
March 28, 2018 / 8:20 PM / Updated 16 minutes ago BRIEF-Sunworks' Q4 Revenue Rose 4.6 Pct To $19.3 Mln Reuters Staff 
March 28 (Reuters) - Sunworks Inc: 
* SUNWORKS REPORTS 2017 FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR RESULTS * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE UP 10 TO 20 PERCENT 
* MANAGEMENT EXPECTS COMPANY TO BE PROFITABLE FOR FULL YEAR OF 2018 
* SUNWORKS - NEW PROJECTS BOOKED IN Q1 ARE EXPECTED TO EXCEED $30 MILLION, WITH MAJORITY OF BOOKINGS EXPECTED TO CONVERT INTO INSTALLATION REVENUE IN 2018. Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
